long_description: The pear-shaped Petzl(R) William Ball-Lock carabiner features a handy autolocking gate and is well-suited for belaying and anchoring needs. Larger size allows easy anchoring of multiple ropes and slings, as well as belaying both single or double ropes with a Munter hitch. Unique, patented Keylock gate uses a key-shaped nose on carabiner and slot-shaped gate to create a strong, snag-free closure. Automatic Ball-Lock system features a green ball indicating when sleeve is locked, providing a quick visual safety check. Ball-Lock system can be opened and closed easily with one hand and can be operated with gloves on; unlock gate by pressing in ball and twisting sleeve. Large gate opening eases clip-in. Made of high-strength aluminum rod stock for superior strength and durability.
short_description: The pear-shaped Petzl(R) William Ball-Lock carabiner features a handy autolocking gate and is well-suited for belaying and anchoring needs.
